Question: On September 28, 2010, this person was nominated for the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame.
Hints: This person was inducted into the Songwriters Hall of Fame in 1984 and into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 2011.
Neil Leslie **** (born January 24, 1941) is an American singer-songwriter with a career that began in the 1960s.
This person spent his early career as a songwriter in the Brill Building.
